description:
The Confessions of Frances Godwin is the fictional memoir of a retired high school Latin teacher looking back on a life of trying to do her best amidst transgressionsÃ¢â‚¬â€starting with her affair with Paul, whom she later marries. Now that Paul is dead and sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s retired, Frances Godwin thinks her story is overÃ¢â‚¬â€but of course the rest of her life is full of surprises, including the truly shocking turn of events that occurs when she takes matters into her own hands after her daughter StellaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s husband grows increasingly abusive.
